answers.answer: Hi, relax, tumors presentations are bit different, need is to get yourself investigated for diabetes, thyroid disorder and also get MRI done after consultation with neurologist.Try initially pain killers along with some vitamin supplements, if no response are seen in 3-4 days, do consult doctor. Also, get your blood pressure checked.

hi seen nurologist yr and half ago had mra was ok seen him again when headaches sfarted again said anxiety not anxious at all had thyroid checked begginig yr didnt think had any symptoms diabetes will get checked thankyuo for your time
